Gentlemen:
Information is requested concerning the planning
of a television program in the music field, preferably
vocal at high school level.
If this is not available, I am interested in proÂ¬
grams for teaching strings or piano via television.
Please bill to me at the above address if there is
any charge for this information. Thank you very much.
Very truly yours.
(Mrs.)/Mary E. K. Peerson
